This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: strange light SE of my house (address above)
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out to smoke a cig at 9:45 pm. The first thing i noticed was a bright orange light, not super bright, just like a really bright star, but brighter than any star out. this was southeast of my house. at first i thought it was mars. it acended slowly for about 7 minutes, but not very high. i went inside to get my binoculars, got it focused in on the object. there was a light on each side. i watched for 10 seconds in the binoculars, then the lights quickly faded. it didn't go behind clouds, as other stars were still visible in that direction. then nothing. it was 10:05 when it was over and done. did anyone else report this object?
